sources.title: Shoot to Kill
sources.description: A former gangster (Robert Kent) who was framed by a corrupt district attorney (Charles Trowbridge). With his wife and an investigative reporter he gathers proof of his innocence in hopes of clearing his name.

sources.title: Shoot to Kill (1947)
sources.description: A gritty crime story involving a newspaper man and crooked politicians. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/shoot-to-kill-1947/

sources.title: Shoot to Kill (1947) RUSSELL WADE
sources.description:
Stars: Russell Wade, Luana Walters and Edmund MacDonald
Director: William Berke

A woman apparently marries a corrupt deputy D.A. to get evidence that a certain criminal was framed for murder.

sources.title: Shoot to Kill (1947) Crime, Drama, Film-Noir Full Length Movie
sources.description:
A Newspaperman... A Grafting Politician... And A Beautiful Girl... In A Story Of Underworld Revenge!  A woman apparently marries a corrupt deputy D.A. to get evidence that a certain criminal was framed for murder.

Director: William Berke
Writer: Edwin V. Westrate 
Stars: Russell Wade, Luana Walters, Edmund MacDonald
Genres: Crime, Drama, Film-Noir, Thriller

metadata.Plot: Gangster Dixie Logan is framed by crooked DA Lawrence Dale. His wife secures a job as Dale's assistant, the better to find the proof of the DA's dishonesty. She gets help from Reporter Mitchell, who falls in love with her.
metadata.Actors: Russell Wade, Luana Walters, Edmund MacDonald
